sentences.en: Acts for and on behalf of clients in the areas of property transfer, company and business law, trusts, wills, probate and litigation under the general supervision of a Barrister or Solicitor.
sentences.cn: 在律师的监督下，代表客户处理财产转让、公司和商业法律、基金、遗嘱，遗嘱认证和诉讼事务。

sentences.en: And he held that the will must be admitted to probate.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为,必须认可检验遗嘱的效力.

sentences.en: How will you preserve your assets from estate taxes and probate fees?
sentences.cn: 怎样保护你的财产不受税和遗产公证的影响?

sentences.en: Ifsome of your funds and/or assets have been acquired by inheritance you willneed to provide appropriate evidence, eg probate or evidence from yoursolicitor, to show that they were acquired lawfully.
sentences.cn: 如果你的部分资金和/或资产是通过继承所得，你将需要提供适当的证据，例如，你的律师提供的遗嘱或证据表明资产和/或资金是合法获得的。

sentences.en: Private law includes property, family, tort, probate, and corporate law.
sentences.cn: 私营法规包括物产 、 家庭 、 侵权行为 、 遗嘱的认证和公司法.

sentences.en: Probate cases can go on for two years or more.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱认证案可能会持续两年或更长时间。

sentences.en: Probate courts handle family financial situations following a death.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱认证法院负责解决因家庭成员去世而引起的家庭财产纠纷案件.

sentences.en: Probate: Use probate law and procedures.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱: 使用遗嘱的法律和程序.

words.tran_cn: 试用的；缓刑的；实习中的
证明的；检验的；提供证据的
试用人员；实习生；缓刑犯；试读生

trans.tran_cn: 遗嘱检验，经检验的遗嘱文本
trans.tran_en: the legal process of deciding that someone’s  will  has been properly made

trans.tran_cn: [法] 遗嘱认证；处以缓刑；加以监护；在遗嘱认证法庭证明…精神失常
[法] 遗嘱认证，处以缓刑，加以监护，在遗嘱认证法庭证明…精神失常
